description: There is no policy check extension_info v3(v2.1) API.
title: miss policy check in v3 api extension_info

comments.content: There is no policy check extension_info v3(v2.1) API.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~yuntongjin

comments.content:
extension_info is currently being reworked significantly and is not policy enforced in v2 or v2.1 

Is this a cleanup like change or is there an actual need for policy enforcement on this resource? If there is will probably need to be done using a dummy microversion
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/173210
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/173210
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=36df2936ad0c04013cc105f1eee56f9a515de346
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 36df2936ad0c04013cc105f1eee56f9a515de346
Author: yuntongjin <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Apr 14 16:29:39 2015 +0800

    Add policy check for extension_info
    
    This patch adds default policy enforcement for extension info. By
    default the rule is empty, but operator can configure it if they
    don't want normal user to see extension info.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1415286
    Change-Id: I6afcf6f9e2cedb86e899a360e1abb22ccc1f0a27
    Co-authored-by: Eli Qiao <email address hidden>
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
